mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hotelid AS "hotelid", a.hotelname AS "hotelname", a.usercode AS "usercode", a.username AS "username", a.checktime AS "checktime", a.checktype AS "checktype", a.checktypename AS "checktypename"
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ots.t_hotel_operate_log WHERE hotelid = #{hotelid} AND checktype IN (3, 4) AND checktime >= #{begin} AND checktime <= #{end} ORDER BY checktime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_hotel_operate_log( id, hotelid, hotelname, usercode, username, checktime, checktype, checktypename ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hotelid}, #{hotelname}, #{usercode}, #{username}, #{checktime}, #{checktype}, #{checktypename} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_hotel_operate_log SET hotelid = #{hotelid}, hotelname = #{hotelname}, usercode = #{usercode}, username = #{username}, checktime = #{checktime}, checktype = #{checktype}, checktypename = #{checktypename} WHERE id = #{id}
